ModMetaData.name: Flame Thrower
ModMetaData.author: Y0ghurt
ModMetaData.description: V1.00 GIVE ME FUEL, GIVE ME FIRE! GIVE ME THAT WHICH I DESIRE! So yea, it's a flame thrower. It throws flame. Research prerequisites: - TBD Crafts at the Machining Table using: - TBD Skill requirement to craft: - None VERSION 1.0 Features: - Like setting things on fire? This might be for you!
